schema.description:
要查询AK泄露事件的ID。

> 调用[DescribeAccesskeyLeakList](~~DescribeAccesskeyLeakList~~)接口可以获取该参数。

资源目录成员账号ID（阿里云账号）。
>调用[DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~)接口可以获取该参数。

Type.description: 泄露信息的类型，固定取值为**AccessKey**。

GithubFileType.description:
GitHub文件类型。取值：

- Python
- XML
- GO
- Javascript
- INI
- JSON
- C++

WhitelistStatus.description:
AK泄露事件是否已加入白名单。取值：

- **no**：未加入白名单
- **yes**：已加入白名单

GmtModified.description: 泄露事件的最新发现时间。

Asset.description: 资产所在的平台，取值固定为**云平台**。

RequestId.description: 本次调用请求的ID，是由阿里云为该请求生成的唯一标识符，可用于排查和定位问题。

DealType.description:
AK泄露事件的处理方式。取值：

- **manual**：已确认手动删除
- **disable**：已手动禁用
- **add-whitelist**：已加白名单
- **pending**：未处理

GmtCreate.description: AK泄露事件的首次发现时间。

TokenValid.description:
AK关联的密钥有效性。取值：

- **0**：待确认
- **1**：有效
- **2**：无效

WhitelistTime.description: AK白名单添加时间。单位：毫秒。

400.errorMessage: Resource directory account verification has no permission.

500.errorMessage: Resource directory account service internal error.

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Type": "AccessKey", "GithubUserPicUrl": "https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/26296896?s=48&v=****", "GithubUser": "Blue00Blue", "GithubRepoName": "ExamOnline", "GithubFileType": "Python", "Remark": "12", "GithubFileUpdateTime": "2021-07-06T09:49:33", "WhitelistStatus": "no", "GithubFileName": "testAkLeak", "Source": "GitHub", "GmtModified": "2021-07-06 17:49:39", "Asset": "云平台", "DealTime": "2022-01-17 15:47:08", "RequestId": "79CFF74D-E967-5407-8A78-EE03B925FDAA", "AccesskeyId": "LTAI4G4VjkC9wenfEvgX****", "GithubFileUrl": "https://github.com/Blue00Blue/ExamOnline/blob/6c932c10fc3f217783f3937e2b230f79656c18a7/testAk****", "DealType": "add-whitelist", "Code": "\\n1231 \\nak=LTAI4G4VjkC9wenfEvgX**** \\n12311123 \\nsk1999 \\nsk1999sk1999 \\nsk1999sk1999 \\n\\n\\ntest001 ak hht \\nak=LTAI4G4VjkC9wenfEvgX**** \\nsk=AjEhS9XmnIzllpAx2LxMTMdrTG****", "GmtCreate": "2021-07-06 17:49:41", "GithubRepoUrl": "https://github.com/Blue00Blue/ExamOn****", "TokenValid": 2, "WhitelistTime": 1689172004478 }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" AccessKey https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/26296896?s=48&v=**** Blue00Blue ExamOnline Python 12 2021-07-06T09:49:33 no testAkLeak GitHub 2021-07-06 17:49:39 云平台 2022-01-17 15:47:08 79CFF74D-E967-5407-8A78-EE03B925FDAA LTAI4G4VjkC9wenfEvgX**** https://github.com/Blue00Blue/ExamOnline/blob/6c932c10fc3f217783f3937e2b230f79656c18a7/testAk**** add-whitelist \n1231 \nak=LTAI4G4VjkC9wenfEvgX**** \n12311123 \nsk1999 \nsk1999sk1999 \nsk1999sk1999 \n\n\ntest001 ak hht \nak=LTAI4G4VjkC9wenfEvgX**** \nsk=AjEhS9XmnIzllpAx2LxMTMdrTG**** 2021-07-06 17:49:41 https://github.com/Blue00Blue/ExamOn**** ","errorExample":""}]
title: 查看AccessKey泄露事件详情
